Flow.description: Set product group info on product - used to carry to field on Quote and used in Quote templates to evaluate if specific addendums should be added to Quote/Contract or not.

value.stringValue: OR(VALUE([Product2].ProductCode) >= 23000 && VALUE([Product2].ProductCode)<= 23999 , VALUE([Product2].ProductCode) >= 27000 && VALUE([Product2].ProductCode)<= 27999 , VALUE([Product2].ProductCode) >= 28000 && VALUE([Product2].ProductCode)<= 28999, VALUE([Product2].ProductCode) >= 29000 && VALUE([Product2].ProductCode)<= 29999 )

Flow.label: Set Product Group on Product
